DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : Determine efficacy SNAG technique ( Mulligan ) apply subgroup people non-specific low back pain ( LBP ) two new kinematic-algorythms , pain , functional disability kinesiophobia . Design : A randomized double blind placebo control trial double arm accordance CONSORT statement . Subjects : Patients non-specific low back pain recruting Saint-Luc hospital , subgroup include accord specific inclusion criterion tailor indication application SNAG 's therapy ( Mulligan technique apply lumbar spine ) . Method : Subjects randomize 2 group ; real-SNAG sham-SNAG group . All patient treat single session , real/sham SNAG apply sit position belt , flexion direction . Two kinematic-algorythms ( ROM Speed ) validate kinematic spine model use record opto-electronic device ( BTS-Elite ) . Pain rest flexion , well functional disability kinesiophobia record self-reported measure . These outcome blindly evaluate treatment compare group `` Two-Way-ANOVA `` statistic factor ; time group .
